languages.text: On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, this character applies the confounded {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} on their target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The targeted enemy cannot use {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, this character applies the confounded negative effect on their target for 1 round. The targeted enemy cannot use {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, this character applies the confounded {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} on their target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The targeted enemy cannot use {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

languages.text: При успешном {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадании{/g} по цели этот персонаж накладывает на нее {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативный эффект{/g} "в растерянности" на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Цель не может совершать {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}.
languages.original_text: On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, this character applies the confounded {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} on their target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The targeted enemy cannot use {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

languages.text: Bei einem erfolgreichen {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} wendet dieser Charakter für 1 Runde den negativen Effekt „Verwirrt“ auf sein Ziel an. Der anvisierte Feind kann keine {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} ausführen.
languages.original_text: On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, this character applies the confounded negative effect on their target for 1 round. The targeted enemy cannot use {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Bei einem erfolgreichen {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} wendet dieser Charakter für 1 Runde den negativen Effekt „Verwirrt“ auf sein Ziel an. Der anvisierte Feind kann keine {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} ausführen.

languages.text: En cas de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} réussi, ce personnage applique l'effet négatif de confusion à sa cible pendant 1 round. L'ennemi ciblé ne peut pas réaliser d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaque d'opportunité{/g}.
languages.original_text: On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, this character applies the confounded negative effect on their target for 1 round. The targeted enemy cannot use {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: En cas de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} réussi, ce personnage applique l'effet négatif de confusion à sa cible pendant 1 round. L'ennemi ciblé ne peut pas réaliser d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaque d'opportunité{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标时，会使目标陷入“眩惑”状态，持续一轮。受影响的敌人无法使用{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}。
languages.original_text: On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, this character applies the confounded negative effect on their target for 1 round. The targeted enemy cannot use {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标时，会使目标陷入“眩惑”状态，持续一轮。受影响的敌人无法使用{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}。

languages.text: Al {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactar{/g} con éxito, este personaje aplica el efecto negativo confuso a su objetivo durante 1 asalto. El enemigo objetivo no puede usar {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}ataques de oportunidad{/g}.
languages.original_text: On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, this character applies the confounded negative effect on their target for 1 round. The targeted enemy cannot use {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Al {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactar{/g} con éxito, este personaje aplica el efecto negativo confuso a su objetivo durante 1 asalto. El enemigo objetivo no puede usar {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}ataques de oportunidad{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃{/g}が当たると、ターゲットに1ラウンドの間、困惑のマイナス効果を与える。ターゲットにされた敵は、{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}機会攻撃{/g}を使えない。

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃{/g}が当たると、ターゲットに1ラウンドの間、困惑のマイナス効果を与える。ターゲットにされた敵は、{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}機会攻撃{/g}を使えない。
